name: Lost in Space (WebGL)
description:
For best experience, use the desktop version: https://hellbladenz.itch.io/lost-in-space

Description

You are stranded in space with a storm approaching which your ship is not protected against. You need to get to the closest space station in order to survive.

Keep pushing forward, each successive level gets bigger with more objects. Be on the lookout to replenish your power, you don't want to get caught with none.

Made for the Ludum Dare 39 game jam, theme being 'Running out of Power'.

Credits

Graphics and sound effects are free assets made by Kenney - www.kenney.nl

Music by Antti Luode:
Anttis instrumentals - Plastic Starships on fire
Anttis instrumentals - Space Dominator Squadron
Anttis instrumentals - Stupid Space Opera

http://www.soundclick.com/_mobileFrame.cfm?bandID=1277008
